title: Research Intern @Mobile Commerce Lab
text: Working with Prof. Norman Sadeh to add notifications to the cross-platform IoT Assistant App (available in App Store and Google Play Store) with Flutter
Engineering the notification functionality infrastructure using background location tracking and geofences

title: Software Engineer Intern @Meta
text: Modularized and introduced text embeddings to the charity search model, which is used in 60% of fundraiser creation flows
Improved recall at 90% precision of personal fundraiser review model by > 10% for each model class

title: Software Development Engineer Intern @Amazon
text: Built the curated colors widget that displays curated paint palettes to customers on Amazon Paint Finder
Designed and implemented an algorithm to extract trending color palettes from interior room images using Amazon SageMaker and AWS Lambda to be used in the curated colors feature

title: Research Intern @Human-Computer Interaction Institute
text: Worked with Tianshi Li to analyze the r/AndroidDev subreddit to understand app developer motivations, actual practices, and gaps in knowledge and tool support with respect to privacy
Collected online discussion data through building machine learning models to identify privacy/security-related discussion and conducting qualitative/quantitative analysis on the data
Work featured in paper "How Developers Talk about Personal Data and What It Means for User Privacy: A Case Study of a Developer Forum on Reddit" that has been accepted to CSCW 2020

title: Extern @Cisco
text: Collaborated in team of 3 to create solution for transportation problems through proposal to reroute bus routes depending on machine learning algorithms in order to ease traffic congestion and presented it to a senior VP in Cisco
Introduced concept of using a rewards system in a mobile app that gives redeemable points when user takes public transportation or back roads
